name: api-with-postgresql
description: Creating an API with PostgreSQL and Expres project, full stack javascript developer, udacity

scripts.test: export ENV=test && npx tsc && db-migrate db:drop full_stack_test && db-migrate db:create full_stack_test && db-migrate up --env test && jasmine  && db-migrate db:drop full_stack_test
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cd dist && eb deploy
scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc &&  cp -R .elasticbeanstalk dist/.elasticbeanstalk &&  cp package.json dist/package.json
scripts.build2: npm install . && npm run clean && tsc &&  cp -R .elasticbeanstalk dist/.elasticbeanstalk &&  cp package.json dist/package.json && cd dist && zip -r ../back.zip . && cd ..

author: daddy2054
